column4: should i use a proprietary driver for ati?  i went to system > admin > hardware drivers and it said my ati graphics accelleration was not in use.  should i enable it?
ate causes a lot of problems, if you're not planning on playing big 3d games, don't ...
try it, if you can run it perfectly, then there's no need for the other driver, if it doesn't, then you might need it
